name: Lake Delton Mule
description: This simple drink is a spin on the classic vodka-and-ginger-beer drink, the Moscow Mule. The combination of genepy, an herbal Alpine liqueur, the sweet snap of the Wondermint and the tangy bite of the ginger beer makes for a refreshing summer cocktail. The drink is named after a small town in Wisconsin where Mr. Bartels had his first restaurant job.
recipeIngredient: Piece of candied ginger, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: In rocks glass filled with ice, combine all the liquid ingredients. Stir until chilled, about 30 seconds. Garnish with candied ginger.
